name: Anime Clicker
description: So, I was bored one weekend and decided to make a Cookie Clicker game with Anime characters. I lost my Motivation pretty quickly and because of that, the game has a big lack of content, but I think it can still be a good game for in between. I decided to choose some of my favourite New-Gen-Main-Characters, such as e.g. Tanjiro, Senku or Asta.
